North_Las_Vegas.Silver Bell Wedding Chapel: Silver Bell Wedding Chapel (a.k.a. Silver Bells Wedding Chapel) was a wedding chapel located on Las Vegas Boulevard in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA. Established in the 1950s the site was host to hundreds of thousands of weddings in its history including the celebrity weddings of Burt Bacharach and Angie Dickenson in 1965 and Rodney Dangerfield to Joan Child in 1993. It was also featured in the television movie Saved by the Bell: Wedding in Las Vegas and the film Lost in America.
